trans-unit.source: Represents the digitizer device of a Tablet PC.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterer gjeldende inndata for tavle-enheten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> som rapporterer gjeldende inndata for tavle-enheten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: Henter den unike identifikatoren for tavle-enheten på systemet.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: Den unike identifikatoren for tavle-enheten på systemet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the tablet device.
The name of the tablet device.
Gets the product identifier for the tablet device.
The manufacturer of the tablet device is responsible for adding this string.
trans-unit.target: Produsenten av tavle-enheten er ansvarlig for å legge til denne strengen.

trans-unit.source: The return value is empty if the tablet device does not have an identifier.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres er tom hvis tavle-enheten ikke har en identifikator.

trans-unit.source: The product identifier for the tablet device.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> objekter som den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> støtter.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> objekter som den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> støtter.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som gir grunnleggende inndata behandling for tavle-enheten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som gir grunnleggende inndata behandling for tavle-enheten.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the tablet device.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
